title: Abilitor

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Every night, you may select another player and come up with a night ability. They will have that ability starting tomorrow morning, as long as the host approves (host shouldn't approve if it's unfun or unbalanced). They may not use their new ability at the same time as any of their other abilities.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Attributor goal but like but like with abilities

desc:
Post 574
*With my help, ANYONE can commit mass murder!*
